metadata.title: CVE-2024-41044 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ppp: reject claimed-as-LCP but actually malformed packetsSince 'ppp_async_encode()' assumes valid LCP packets (with codefrom 1 to 7 inclusive), add 'ppp_check_packet()' to ensure thatLCP packet has an actual body beyond PPP_LCP header bytes, andreject claimed-as-LCP but actually malformed data otherwise.
